policies.description: Validate that the flight status is 'available' to ensure the flight has not taken off and available seats and prices are listed for booking.
references: if the status is "available", the flight has not taken off, available seats and prices are listed.

policies.description: Ensure the flight status is not 'delayed' or 'on time' since those flights have not taken off, but cannot be booked.
references: if the status is "delayed" or "on time", the flight has not taken off, cannot be booked.

policies.description: Confirm flight status is not 'flying' as it indicates the flight has already taken off but not landed, making it unavailable for booking.
references: if the status is "flying", the flight has taken off but not landed, cannot be booked.
